title: How to Be Cute to Your Boyfriend over Text

steps.title: It will be the first thing he sees when he wakes up.
steps.content: It will be the first thing he sees when he wakes up. It’s always nice to wake up to a text from your boo! When you get out of bed, quickly text him a sweet good morning to make his day. Try something like: [1] X Research source “Good morning! I hope you have a great day.” “Time to wake up! Can’t wait to see you later.” “Good morning babe!”

steps.title: Keep your conversation moving by texting him a few questions.
steps.content: Keep your conversation moving by texting him a few questions. [2] X Expert Source Cher Gopman Dating Coach Expert Interview. 17 May 2019. You could ask him about your relationship, where he sees himself in the future, or just what he’s up to right now. The more questions you ask, the more fun your conversation will be. Try questions like: [3] X Research source “Do you have any hidden talents?” “Would you ever go skydiving?” “What’s your favorite memory of us so far?” “What is your favorite movie of all time?”

steps.title: Send a suggestive text message to get his engine going.
steps.content: Send a suggestive text message to get his engine going. Just because you two aren’t together in person doesn’t mean you can’t flirt! Craft a fun, sexy message to send him, like: [4] X Research source “I had a dream about you last night. Wanna hear what it was about?” “If we were stuck together on a deserted island, what’s the first thing you would do?” “Thinking of you and how you kissed me last night. Wish you were here.”

steps.title: It could be of himself, his animals, nature—anything!
steps.content: It could be of himself, his animals, nature—anything! Request that he sends you an artistic picture so you can gush about how nice it looks. Follow up with the best picture you’ve ever taken so you can both compliment each other. [5] X Research source Propose it by saying something like, “What’s the best pic you have on your phone?”

steps.title: Point out his looks, his personality, or even his voice.
steps.content: Point out his looks, his personality, or even his voice. Send him a text giving him a compliment so he knows you can’t wait to see him again. If you aren’t sure what to say, think about what you like about him the most. Try something like: [6] X Research source “Your voice is my favorite sound.” “You looked so good in that picture you posted earlier.” “I feel so safe around you.”

steps.title: If he pops into your head throughout the day, send him a text.
steps.content: If he pops into your head throughout the day, send him a text. Maybe you remember something sweet he did, or maybe you’re laughing at a joke he told. You can make his day by telling him what you just thought of, like: [7] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source “I can’t stop thinking about how hard we laughed together last night. I had so much fun.” “You keep running through my mind! Stop distracting me, I’m busy.”

steps.title: These goofy phrases will make him laugh out loud.
steps.content: These goofy phrases will make him laugh out loud. If you want to send him something sweet but you aren’t sure what to say, try one of these lines. Add a few emojis in to really send a message! [8] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source “Forget the butterflies. I feel the whole zoo when I’m with you!” “I know you’re busy today, but please add me to your to-do list.”

steps.title: You might make him chuckle when he reads what you’ve sent.
steps.content: You might make him chuckle when he reads what you’ve sent. Pick the most over-the-top pickup line that you can think of to really get a giggle out of him. If you’re lucky, he’ll send one back! Try something like: [9] X Research source “Do you like raisins? How about a date?” “If I could rearrange the alphabet, I’d put U and I together.” “I must be a snowflake, because I’ve fallen for you.”

steps.title: Play up your excitement to let him know you miss him.
steps.content: Play up your excitement to let him know you miss him. Even if you just saw him yesterday, send him a sweet text telling him how eager you are to see him again. It will convey the message that you like him a lot and enjoy his company. Say something like: [10] X Research source “Can’t wait to see you tomorrow! I always have so much fun when we hang out.” “Counting down the days until I see you again. Miss you lots.”

steps.title: It will show him that you’re excited to see him again.
steps.content: It will show him that you’re excited to see him again. Text him a few date ideas to see if he likes any of them. If he does, that’s your cue to get planning! Try something like: [11] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source “Want to come over to my house and Netflix and chill?” “I’d love to take you to that new restaurant downtown.” “What do you think about a date to the aquarium?”

steps.title: Let him know he’s on your mind as you fall asleep.
steps.content: Let him know he’s on your mind as you fall asleep. Tell him you’re going to bed and assure him that you can’t wait to talk to him in the morning. Even if he’s already asleep, he’ll appreciate your sweet sentiment. Say something like: [12] X Research source “Goodnight, I’ll see you in my dreams.” “Sleep tight, I’ll talk to you in the morning.” “Goodnight, I can’t wait to see you tomorrow.”

steps.title: Take a selfie or grab a shot of your surrounding landscape.
steps.content: Take a selfie or grab a shot of your surrounding landscape. Send it to your boyfriend with a fun caption letting him know where you are and what you’re doing. It’s a nice way to update him on your daily life, and you might even get a cute selfie back! [13] X Expert Source Cher Gopman Dating Coach Expert Interview. 17 May 2019. If you aren’t feeling the selfie vibes, grab a cute pic of your animals or the view instead.

steps.title: He’ll be delighted that you’re thinking of him when he’s not there.
steps.content: He’ll be delighted that you’re thinking of him when he’s not there. Pull up your Spotify, Apple Music, or YouTube account, and search for a song that makes you think of him. Send him a link along with a caption like, “This made me think of you.” [14] X Expert Source Cher Gopman Dating Coach Expert Interview. 17 May 2019. You could send a song that played on your first date, a song that you two danced to, or just one that really captures who he is as a person.

steps.title: It will keep your messages lighthearted and fun.
steps.content: It will keep your messages lighthearted and fun. Throw in a few smiley faces or some heart emojis when you’re feeling it. Try to stick to 1 or 2 emojis per message so you don’t flood his phone with them! [15] X Expert Source Cher Gopman Dating Coach Expert Interview. 17 May 2019. You could also look for funny gifs or cute pictures to send instead.

steps.title: Tell him that this made you laugh or think of him.
steps.content: Tell him that this made you laugh or think of him. If you stumble across a funny meme that you like, text it to him so he can laugh too. You could also send it to him via Instagram or Twitter if it’s easier. [16] X Trustworthy Source Greater Good Magazine Journal published by UC Berkeley's Greater Good Science Center, which uses scientific research to promote happier living Go to source Bonus points if the meme references an inside joke or tv show that you both really like!
